column2: Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas
column3: oh yeah have yourself a merry little christmas let your heart be light from now on your troubles will be out of sight mmm oh yeah   have yourself a merry little christmas make the yuletide gay from now on our troubles will be miles away oh   here we are as in olden days happy golden days of yores faithful friends who are dear to us gather near to us once more ooh   through the years we all will be together if the fates allow until then we'll have to muddle through somehow and have yourself a merry little christmas now
